item.title: Our work on SAM-based Object and Attribute Discovery was accepted at the SIM Workshop at ICML 2025
Xlstm
item.description: A couple of weeks ago, my Twitter feed was flooded with discussions about the new xLSTM paper. Curious, I took a quick look at it. Like most papers, it first presents a problem statement, highlights the challenges in solving that problem, and finally details the approach used to addressâ€”or not addressâ€”these challenges. The xLSTM paper did this well, but it also brought me back to some fundamental questions: How does the original LSTM solve the gradient explosion and vanishing gradient problems?
